thread.title: Mesut Ozil: Arsene Wenger lays into Arsenal’s poor form by saying ‘it’s time he started scoring again’
thread.title_full: Mesut Ozil: Arsene Wenger lays into Arsenal’s poor form by saying ‘it’s time he started scoring again’

author: sstreet
title: Mesut Ozil: Arsene Wenger lays into Arsenal’s poor form by saying ‘it’s time he started scoring again’
text:
Comments ARSENE WENGER is concerned about the poor form of contract rebel Mesut Ozil. 
And the Arsenal boss is demanding the £42.5million record signing dazzles against Bayern Munich on Wednesday. Getty Images Wenger is expecting a marked improvement from Mesut Ozil 
Germany playmaker Ozil again failed to net in Saturday’s 2-0 win over Hull. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
And Wenger said: “Maybe it’s time for Mesut to score a goal again. He needs a big moment to find his confidence again. 
“At the moment he misses chances that don’t look unfeasible for him to score. AP:Associated Press The Gunners boss believes Ozil needs to start taking his chances Reuters Arsenal go to Bayern Munich on Wednesday and will need Ozil in top form AP:Associated Press Wenger knows a Champions League win would ease the pressure on him and his side Arsenal 2-0 Hull : Alexis Sanchez brace secures the points for Arsenal 
“I completely agree that was not technically confident and that is a problem for us because we always think he can deliver something special.” 
Ozil, 28, has not scored for more than two months as Arsenal have dropped out of the title race. 
Yet he has refused all efforts to get him to agree a new deal, saying he will not sign until he knows if Wenger will still be manager next season. 
The former Real Madrid star was slated for his performance in last week's 3-1 defeat at Chelsea. 
One incident in particular stuck out, in which Ozil and Alexis Sanchez refused to track back, leaving Nemanja Matic to stroll into the Arsenal half. Arsenal star Mesut Ozil stars in the latest advert for Mercedes Benz cars
